CREATE TABLE Visionary (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(10),
    last_name VARCHAR(10),
    domain VARCHAR(20),
    title VARCHAR(30),
    dream VARCHAR(100)
);

INSERT INTO Visionary VALUES
(1, '*****', '*****', 'Aerospace', 'People\'s President', 'Dream, Dream, Dream...');


SELECT first_name, last_name
FROM Visionary
WHERE domain = 'Aerospace'
  AND title LIKE '%President%'
  AND dream LIKE '%Dream%';

; üîê Riddle in Assembly ‚Äî "---" 

section .data
    msg db "I guard your money, speak in digits,", 10
        db "Serve you day and night without a tongue.", 10
        db "What am I?", 10, 10
        db "Answer: ATM", 10
    len equ $-msg

section .text
    global _start

_start:
    mov rax, 1      ; sys_write
    mov rdi, 1      ; stdout
    mov rsi, msg
    mov rdx, len
    syscall
    mov rax, 60     ; sys_exit
    xor rdi, rdi
    syscall
